lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: There are people in need and I am able to help out in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach social studies to students in 8th grade.

lender.name: nazif
lender.loan_because: i want to trader and bisness
lender.occupational_info: very good

lender.name: Søren
lender.loan_because: All people should have a chance in life
lender.occupational_info: Making Educational Games for Children

lender.name: rick
lender.loan_because:
I learned about Kiva through Toronto Star newspaper article in August, 2008.
I joined Kiva a few minutes after reading it and understanding the positive impact micro-loans can have on people's lives.
The money I used to spend supporting a 2-cup-a-day coffee habit is now directed to Kiva and other charitable causes.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm an Information Coordinator in procurement.
I answer questions and provide information about our procurement efforts to the general public, other government ministries and agencies, and suppliers who want to provide services to the government.

lender.name: Nellie and Corné
lender.loan_because: we can really help/support people to build up a better live for themselves and their family with lending money. We really like the idea behing KIVA.ORG, and also the possibility to spread the loans over multiple projects across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Nellie worked as a nurse in our local hospital, Corné works as a project manager with a bank.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe you help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I offer my advice to large companies on how to analyze data.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I am an adoptive mother. Because of the privileges I've had in my life, I am able to be the mom to a beautiful daughter - and her birthmom was not able to raise her because of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home raising my two great children.

lender.name: Paolo
lender.loan_because: I think improving emeging business is very important!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank.

lender.name: Shareen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Many people working together to make a difference is foundational to a better world.

lender.name: Peter M.
lender.loan_because: I feel very privileged to be able to lend other money

lender.name: Aswar
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty, as a person whom life has given much, to give to those who have little.
lender.occupational_info: I study at a school that is for students in the classes of 9 through 12. (I am currently in Class 10)

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I hope that this will make it possible for others to get a better living and hopefully also a way to improve their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Process Manager within the telecom area (Ericsson SW Supply).

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I read an article in the paper about this organization this morning and it inspired me to get involved!
lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the big five banks in Canada and have worked as a lender at various times in my career. I'm now heading up an HR team that helps employees and managers alike be the best that they can be!

lender.name: Fliss
lender.loan_because: we received some money at our wedding recently and I wanted to invest it wisely!

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupation: X-ray sales and service business owner

lender.name: Britt
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: On sabbatical...

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: My grandfather has instilled in me the need to give back to the world. I am very lucky to have the support to see my dreams realized and I want everyone else to have the same chance and support.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a city in recreation and special events. I get to work with people all day and I love it!

lender.name: Jay & Amie
lender.loan_because: we like to help people =)
lender.occupational_info: Amie is a high school math and English teacher. Jay is a Web Developer - he makes web sites.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to have a good life, and repay some of the help I had in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help married people to get along better and individuals to be happier in their life.

lender.name: Blue Topper Folks
lender.loan_because: It spreads our gratitude. And it make the world a better place for our son.

lender.name: Verlin and Elaine
lender.loan_because: we want to share what we have been given
lender.occupational_info: Verlin has a small woodworking shop primarily making wood entry doors Elaine is a psychiatric nurse manager at a small non profit hospital

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their self-sufficiency goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work on projects and procedures at an agricultural lender in California.

lender.name: Mukunda
lender.occupation: social worker for future generaion to come

lender.name: Kang
lender.loan_because: Helping fellow entrepreneurs in third world countries succeed might just prove to be the way for them to break out of the poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I have several online businesses, and plan to start offline businesses very soon, once I've managed to achieve a sizable passive income online.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language (ESL) at an elementary public education school.

lender.name: Pikachu
lender.occupation: an engineer, a kid, and a musician
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: Fighting Chaos and Entropy. Extending our reach.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: if I did not loan this money I would probably just buy something that I "want". Instead I get to help people who "need" it to live and try to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We all are one.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to communicate in a way that is easier and faster.

lender.name: Coach Gia
lender.loan_because: Kiva has provided a secure portal to get the funds to the entrepreneurs that are asking for funding and they are paying back the loans so that you can help someone else if you choose. I call that "Paying it Forward".
lender.occupational_info: I am a Wellness Coach

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is such a fantastic idea, as its not just a handout, it lets people in the developing world take pride in working to make a better life for themselves and their families. Being able to play a small part in this feels great.

lender.name: Marie-Helene
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference...

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to give.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people and athletes in achieving their personal health and fitness goals. If you feel good, you will have the energy, health and vitality to perform well. And if you always strive to do your best - then life will reward you.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: it is unbelievably easy to do

lender.name: Linda Sharp
lender.loan_because: It is a small way to make a real difference. I also love reading the profiles of the other lenders I have joined with in each loan. It is neat to think of working on a team with people from all over the globe - people I have never met. I like to think about who they are and send good energy out to them and to the person we are loaning to.

lender.name: Ethan Mombourquette
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance at doing something great.
lender.occupational_info: I love my work. There is nothing that brings me more joy than when I can cause a student to become interested in learning (anything). I stand at the front of the class and teach about two lessons each week; the rest of the time is just the students working, either alone or in groups, and asking me questions.

lender.name: Teal
lender.loan_because: Its easy to help when so little is asked for.

lender.name: Stacey and Jordan
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to try to make the world a better place and empower my fellow humans. I've traveled a bit in central and South America. I love the cultures, the people and the language (Spanish).
lender.occupational_info: I teach 7 - 9 year olds to read, write, do math, and art.

lender.name: Shalaine
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting entrepreneurs and encouraging free enterprise.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: helping people help themselves is good

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate to live and earn in a way that is comfortable. Not everyone is as fortunate and some are very less so. I saw an episode of Penny Revolution and saw this as a venue I could use to share and help others, so here I am.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a telecommunications technician,my main responsibilities are installing and maintaining the copper and fiber cables that provide the telephone,data and video network of my employer

lender.name: liana
lender.loan_because: I love giving to people

lender.name: T&E
lender.loan_because: We rather lend a fishing pole then give a fish./ Parce que je préfère prêter une cane à pêche que de donner un poisson.
lender.occupational_info: I put together images and text so it can be printed in books./ J'assemble les images et le texte pour que ça puisse être imprimé. Aubergiste va de soit, Hostel keeper seems straight foreward.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I? Lending $25 to empower someone in the developing world makes more sense to me than having a few extra dollars of spending money sitting in my wallet.
lender.occupational_info: When I'm not at home with three children under 5... I write articles and other communications for a respected Canadian company. I'm fortunate to have an energizing job working with truly talented people!

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!

lender.name: hector
lender.loan_because: I saw it make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Forecasting the weather!

lender.name: Raj
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of a mutually beneficial relationship
lender.occupational_info: I teach graduate-level business students

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help others with the money the Lord has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick and premature babies.

lender.name: The Browne Clan
lender.loan_because: We have so much, let's give a little, because with a little, we can give so much!

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: we are all one family.

lender.name: Sita
lender.loan_because: we are all One
lender.occupational_info: spiritual seeker

lender.name: Donna
lender.occupation: Album Designer; Co-Owner of Photography Business
lender.loan_because: I like having a direct impact on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I run a photography business with my husband. We photograph weddings, special events, families and new moms. I also design albums for our business and have started my own business, www.albumdiva.com, for professional photographers who want to outsource their album designs.

lender.name: Felicia
lender.loan_because: Someday I want to have my own clothing business, but until that day, I'd like to help other people make that happen!
lender.occupational_info: I tutor students in math, but I also like to make clothes!

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinancing and love being able to participate on a personal level.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate environmental projects and partnerships in the former Soviet Union.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe all mankind deserves a chance to provide for their families and that those of us who have been honored with wealth should spend a great deal of what we having giving back!
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan their retirement investments and help them learn to budget so they can provide for themselves and others.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: i admire and respect the entrepreneurial spirit exhibited by these loan applicants.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Someone loaned to us and the stories are priceless.
lender.occupational_info: We teach at the university and at home.

lender.name: NURAIN
lender.loan_because: i want to help me friend to have her confidence back and stand up with her legs. i also want to start a small business.

lender.name: NJH
lender.loan_because: I have a conscience and priorities...
lender.occupational_info: I've mostly worked testing software, but really, I test everything I run into...

lender.name: Birte
lender.loan_because: Many small people, who in many small places do many small things, can alter the face of the world. I can't get this quote right, but you know what I mean. :-)

lender.name: Y. C.
lender.loan_because: Love to human.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: It is so cool to help people on the other side of the world. And: why should the bank have my money?
lender.occupational_info: Making Websites like kiva.org. Programming PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, CakePHP, Zend Framework, HTML, CSS and so on.

lender.name: Adina Cappell
lender.loan_because:
"There are eight levels of charity, each greater than the next.
[1] The greatest level, above which there is no greater, is ..... endowing him with a gift or loan, or entering into a partnership with him, or finding employment for him, in order to strengthen his hand until he need no longer be dependent upon others..."
Maimonides, Mishneh Torah, Laws of Charity, 10:7-14

lender.name: Jesica
lender.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful way to help those who need it.

lender.name: kakito
lender.loan_because: BECAUSE I'M RUNINING A BUSINESS THAT WHY I NEED LOAN
lender.occupational_info: YES

lender.name: Klaus
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can and am able by the Grace of God

lender.name: Lyndsey
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to better their lives and maybe need a little financial support. If everyone shared their wealth the world would be a different place!!
lender.occupational_info: Im am currently studying Nutrtional Science at university, but i cooked many meals in restaurants in my previous job as a chef.

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: Microfinance works! I've been given a lot of opportunity and feel the need to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Movie Maker, Educator, Spiritual Advisor

lender.name: LaNita
lender.loan_because: I want to support the economy on an international level. The travel and tourism industry is world wide, we (small entrepreneurs) can all network and benefit from promoting each other!
lender.occupational_info: I help people with directions and activity choices while they are visiting the resort property I work for. I also, along with other security officers, keep the entire facility safe.

lender.name: Taylor and Shelby
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: We raise cattle with our parents.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: women and girls are still second-class citizens in most countries.
lender.occupational_info: Encourage local decision makers to build healthier communities.

lender.name: Preetha & Srini
lender.loan_because: We need to eliminate poverty one family at a time. Being parents of two kids, the thought of a child going to bed hungry breaks our hearts.
lender.occupational_info: We were born and brought up in India. Now we live in the U.S.

lender.name: Cathlena
lender.loan_because: that's what is in my heart

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a little more just and give fair chances to some people.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: every one has such amazing ideas and ambitions but not always the footing
lender.occupational_info: still trying to find the perfect fit.

lender.name: T. Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to provide for themselves and their loved ones.

lender.name: Roxanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help small businesses succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I manage finances for small companies.

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I run a small business myself and feel very fortunate about the way it goes. It makes me happy to share this good luck with others.

lender.name: Marci
lender.loan_because: Many times in my life, I got help when I needed it. This is my chance to pay it forward. I am thankful that I am able to help. It makes me happy. The Kiva gift certificate was given to me by my sister for my birthday.

lender.name: Peter and Pam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become successful by starting their own business.
lender.occupational_info: very satisfying

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: Its not government controlled.
lender.occupational_info: I study and prevent workplace incident, accidents and death.

lender.name: Anila and Thakor
lender.loan_because: I can & we must share our good fortune with the rest of the world!

lender.name: Nitsa
lender.loan_because: I can appreciate the hard work of others in their strivings to better their lives. Nothing is free in this world, so a little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: Full-time student at the University of South Florida. Also work for the campus as a building manager in the student center, and the advertising director for the activities board.

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: I can, and should!!!!!

lender.name: Bayan
lender.occupational_info: I am a screenwriter and eventually hope to see my screenplays made into actual films.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: Charity is not the answer
lender.occupational_info: We provide healthy life style products such as manuka honey and organic products in the middle east, we also ship internationally

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: My family may not be rich by America's standards, but we are by the world's. We always have food on the table and a roof over our heads. I give because I am blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I market music for a Christian Record Label. It takes an entrepreneurial spirit to do this job in an ever-changing musical climate. It gives me an appreciation for what these loan recipients are stepping out to do in their own areas of the world.

lender.name: Katja
lender.loan_because: it´s a perfect idea: you help, you get back your money and you help again.

lender.name: Richard & Marina
lender.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We are just caring people who want to help others.

lender.name: Cornelia
lender.loan_because: We are all neighbours on this planet.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I want to help women succeed! I am inspired by women who are motivated to change their lives for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that imports wines from around the world.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: I want to offer others the opportunity to fulfill their dreams and live a better life. We have so much abundance we need to share it with others !
lender.occupational_info: I manage marketing programs for a high tech computer company.

lender.name: Muhammad
lender.occupational_info: My name is Muhammad,I come from a big family of 11 kids. I was born in Kabul, Afghanistan. We became refugees when Afghanistan's war started. We have been Pakistan refugees since I was 12 years old. In the past I have worked as a teacher, cleaner,and taught internet to people in school. In Pakistan it is hard to find good jobs unless one has money, and being a refugee makes it harder yet. I want to start a business so I can help my family be happy and one day go to Canada to marry the woman who as help me get to this site. I will work very hard to get to my dream life.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.occupational_info: I am disabled but have a mind and heart for giving. People tend to see my wheelchair first then me. I am real, I am human, I am a loving person, Help me and I'll help you. We need to help others to help ourselves.

lender.name: Meryl
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently studying biology at Hunter College in New York City

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupation: I work as a Police Dispatcher.
lender.loan_because: I have been to countries where people need the help of others; and it is such a simple thing to do to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a police dispatcher, I answer phone calls and radio traffic to get the officers to the locations where they are needed. I also support the officer when they are on scene with information.

lender.name: Joann
lender.loan_because: The people profiles take me back to when I traveled the world and realized even a small amount of money could improve a person's life. Because of family obligations, I no longer travel but Kiva allows me to still connect with people in developing nations and impact their lives in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I write travel articles, juvenile biographies, and women's fiction. `

lender.name: Cissy
lender.loan_because: I want to give motivated people a chance to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I believe the poor are victims of environment that are as capable and hardworking as anyone else
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in the process of selling and buying large underground pools of petroleum.

lender.name: noah
lender.loan_because: I believe it is all our responsibility to help as many others help themselves as we are financially able to and i see this as that oppertunity.
lender.occupational_info: we buy commercial properties in east texas and lease them to large corperations for a 3 to 10 year period.if there are not buildings on the properties when we purchase them we will construct a building to suit there needs.

lender.name: Hiren Patel
lender.occupation: Teacher/Getter of Objects off high shelves
lender.loan_because: nothing makes you feel better than by spreading good around.
lender.occupational_info: -Trying to get kids to see why fractions and percents are so important when going shopping - Listening to endless requests to get a drink or visit a locker - Explaining that a presentation involving reading your paper is not usually a good idea - Teaching the importance of being a good citizen, environmentally and socially -Watching for when the light bulb goes on --- that's partly what makes it so worthwhile

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: all im giving up is a number on a bank statement, why wouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: i go to school, wooh

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are family

lender.name: vinodh
lender.loan_because: I learned about Kiva through a magazine article and impressed about their work.I like to hear stories from these entrepreneurs.This is an opportunity to learn a new business model and make a global impact.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I know we live in a world of abundance. It is time for everyone to wake up and act that way. A decent lifestyle is the birthright of every human on Earth.

lender.name: Terri Winn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I love the concept of a perpetual loan. Teaching my young boys how to make a difference in someone's life has huge value.
lender.occupational_info: Represent buyer's and seller's of real estate in San Luis Obispo county, California.

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: as a Christian, I want to give back some of the many blessings that Christ has bestowed upon me
lender.occupational_info: I take care of sick patients in the Emergency Department

lender.name: tiny*prints
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, and because many people took a chance on me early in my life that led to my own success.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur - I know how hard you all work.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: It's a hand-up.
lender.occupational_info: I help developmentally disabled adults live fun and interesting independent lives!

lender.name: Liu
lender.loan_because: it can help to ease hardship.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: people need help and I am able to help them.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to dream big... and I would love to help make those dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Our company buys homes that are in bad condition. We fix them up and sell them to new families.

lender.name: Coach Chris
lender.loan_because: It makes a differance in another mother or fathers life.
lender.occupational_info: I put father of two because I work to support 4 people. My daughter, my son, my wife and myself. I would do anything it takes to make sure my family lives. Today, I manager a service company for a local fitness equipment retail store.

lender.name: Fanny
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good way to help people. Sustainable business is the key to success ! According to me, the implication of the business owner is mandatory in order to achieve this success. Wanting to pay back the funds they raised is a proof of good-will.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies to improve the relationship they have with their clients.

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: We are a youth group of 12 members and we are involved in social entrepreneurship work. Where we make a moringa oleifera enriched porridge flour to support PLWAH and orphans in schools around the community. We alo supply NGO's like HelpAge Kenya and sell the products in supermarkets to raise income for the running of the enterprise.

lender.name: MICHELLE CHAPPELL
lender.loan_because: What a great opportunity to give someone a step up in their business and a chance to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I care for our family of five we have three children aged 5, 13 and 18 years. I work in Administration 5 days per week and my husband and I also run a business from home, providing a fencing service in the northern metro areas of Perth, WA. We understand the difficulty in getting a business off the ground and making it successful and the intial funding plays a huge part in that. We hope that our donation can make a difference.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for remote access (you work on one computer while sitting at another computer)

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I care about other people and how they live!

lender.name: Harald
lender.loan_because: I care and i really believe in this type of loans. It's absolutely fantastic that we can help people around the globe fighting poverty, with just a little financial input. Helping people setting up their own business so they can take care of themselve and their loved ones, is something we all should do!

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about small business and the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Roy & Kuyo
lender.loan_because: Sharing is good karma
lender.occupational_info: Roy works in Healthcare education and Kuyo works with special needs kids

lender.name: Luis Sanz Arilla
lender.loan_because: We all need support when we start

lender.name: Katiyar Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that, life's worth is gauged by its purpose.

lender.name: Ari
lender.loan_because: God tells me to.
lender.occupational_info: Treat others as you would like to be treated.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I prefer to help people build a sustainable business in their community. I have visited cambodia, laos and bosnia and admire how people overcome adversity through hard work and kiva is a way I can support in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in local government as an executive manager of finance and corporate services

lender.name: Sharad
lender.loan_because: Being an entrepreneur myself I can relate to the satisfaction that can be achieved by Kiva borrowers when starting a enterprise - however small - from the ground up
lender.occupational_info: Development and Distribution of hi-tech electronic brand - Merlin

lender.name: Clarice
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher for students with Autism.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to get something going.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great model for helping people do what they should be doing: living with dignity and with the promise of a better future for themselves and their children.

lender.name: Big Dee
lender.loan_because: I hope my loan can help someone earn themselves a better standard of living.

lender.name: Sabine
lender.loan_because: I think, this is the right way to really help eachother and to go forward for or better and healthy world. I am really happy to help via Kiva.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: anyone trying to improve their lot in life by working hard and striving to be a better person deserves a chance to succeed in achieving their goal.

lender.name: Sidse
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to help third world countries and its citizens out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build and update websites for various companies.

lender.name: pablo
lender.loan_because: I belive that other people deserve better future

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I can afford it (!) and hope it will help people who truly have these basic needs to fulfill others.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of helping mills to raise their efficiency.

lender.name: Chia-Hung
lender.loan_because: I want to have more positive impacts on societies.
lender.occupational_info: Graduate student studying biochemistry.

lender.name: Oluwasegun
lender.occupational_info: great... I want to get more money so that i can make the deram of a farmer work out

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give someone a hand!
lender.occupational_info: I have a family -- two kids and husband and we own an auto parts business. We also grow fruit and vegetables and enjoy sharing our produce every summer and fall.

lender.name: Gray
lender.loan_because: Small businesses are the foundation of a good community.
lender.occupational_info: I help design buildings that benefit communities.

lender.name: Brian and Nicole
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help out people around the world to get on their feet financially. We travel regularly and see the need around the world. This is another way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Brian helps people resolve conflicts arising from the end of a marriage or relationship. Nicole ensures the safety and comfort of passengers on commercial flights.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: it seems the right thing to do, as I have so much
lender.occupational_info: trader

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: Received a gift certificate and thought to myself: what a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I research and teach on the impacts of climate change on agriculture, looking for ways to forecast and adapt.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: From a single acorn grows a mighty oak. What better way to help people than to facilitate them helping themselves.

lender.name: Anna SystemA
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel happy and useful

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: making a difference in someone else's life isn't a difficult thing to accomplish. I enjoy being able to help out in whatever way I can, and am always looking for innovative ways to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with autistic children at a local school specializing in educational and developmental programs for children with autism. I also volunteer in my community as often as possible through Alpha Phi Omega, a co-ed service based Fraternity that has a chapter at my college campus.

lender.name: FSA Foundation
lender.loan_because: The Foundation for Socioeconomic Advancement sponsors programs to support entrepreneurship, business management, and education in developing nations, particularly the Philippines
lender.occupational_info: A personal foundation, charged with finding unique ways for advancing the socioeconomic development of the Philippines and other regions.

lender.name: David and Maryanne
lender.loan_because: We appreciate and admire those who have their own businesses, and know how hard it can be to get started. If we can offer a little help, it makes our lives better also.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer and I continue to want to make a differance in the world.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful feeling to be able to help others who are in need.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I have have interacted with and know people whose lives could be changed through micro-lending. I do it for the glory of God.
lender.occupational_info: I work with youth in the Presbyterian Church to cultivate mature faith and love for God.

lender.name: David
lender.occupation: Student, website manager, and office clerk

lender.name: Sophia
lender.occupational_info: American student living in the UK with her parents. Learning about business, saving, and giving.

lender.name: Nicoletta
lender.loan_because: It make sense!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people. I admire the incredible risk these entrepreneurs take to provide a better life for themselves and their families. I see genuine goals in these entrepreneurs' statements and am so happy that I can help make a difference in their lives.
"Success in business requires training and discipline and hard work. But if you're not frightened by these things, the opportunities are just as great today as they ever were." David Rockefeller (1915 - )
lender.occupational_info: My goal is to provide legal services to entrepreneurs and businesses of all kinds, from small start-ups to established entities.

lender.name: Farial
lender.loan_because: there is no reason not to.
lender.occupational_info: I am an MBA student.

lender.name: Marta Gómez
lender.loan_because: Hay que ayudar, hay que dar el empujoncito, para que el ser humano tire p'alante.

lender.name: Rocco
lender.loan_because: I want to grow up in a slighty better world

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can. I don't believe in donating money to a cause, because I think that if people work hard they should be able to pull themselves up. KIVA helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I consider myself a "poor college student", but as I've seen in my limited worldly travels, a "poor college student" lives like a king in many countries.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: dollars make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write a blog about books so I can lend dollars to make a difference.

lender.name: Nick and Sheila
lender.loan_because: hey... why not.

lender.name: Merrick Family
lender.loan_because: We just want to try to help people get a little further ahead and be happy.
lender.occupational_info: We work in computers and at schools. Our children are still in school.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: Sharing is the first step to a better life
lender.occupational_info: We own a small Jam and Jelly business.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be able to help others..I have been a Mentor to many children locally and now would like to help in other countries. I want to give back for what has been given me and make a better life for others...
lender.occupational_info: Retired..live in small rural farming community..

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I think third world countries need help thriving.
lender.occupational_info: Igo to school most of the year.

lender.loan_because: I loan because I want people to have a better life, and enjoy life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 10 years old and I own a little friendship bracelet business with my friend Nicole, and I wrote some books with my Dad that he published.

lender.name: Christina Marie
lender.loan_because: i love people

lender.name: Umar
lender.loan_because: It puts the 'power' in empowerment. The rise from poverty is most exciting and rewarding event anyone can ever experience.
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency medicine physician, taking care of the acutely ill and injured. I use lifesaving procedures to help revive and sustain severely injured persons, as well as providing interim care to persons when their usual physician is unavailable.

lender.name: Macarena
lender.loan_because: I think we can all really make a huge impact
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and work too

lender.name: Marlene & Barry
lender.loan_because: We need to share our good fortune
lender.occupational_info: Retired, comfortanble and fortunate.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I like helping others to help themselves. My daughter recommended KIVA. It's been a great experience.
lender.occupational_info: Professional who takes care of other people.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money can make a large impact on a persons life and an entire community.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working with the MFI, Manuela Ramos, in Puno, Peru, to assist in posting journal entries and other projects related to Kiva.

lender.name: Chanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of every man, woman, and child.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Jesus Christ is first and foremost my Lord and Savior. All that I do is because of him and him alone. I believe in small business as a means of diversity in the world market. Capitalism and freedom of the public market to operate should always be encouraged.

lender.name: Lisa-Helene
lender.loan_because: kiva is power and grace working together.
lender.occupational_info: creating opportunities for : Justice

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people to succeed in their ambitions and goals, allowing an improved standard of living and personal fulfilment.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell solar systems to homeowners in the United States and Europe

lender.name: Sui Yin
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need to establish themselves and be independent by providing them the chance to better their lifes and their future. Everyone deserves a chance for a decent life and better future.

lender.name: Folkert
lender.loan_because: Enabling small business by supplying credit, is an efficient way of a structural improvement of someones personal live and the local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to institutional investors in the real estate sector.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Stine
lender.loan_because: I fight against the injustice of food distribution. In northern Europe, we have fished the oceans empty (or poisoned the fish) and are now importing and eating the far away-fish as well. I want local food to feed local people - therefore I'm lending primarily to fish selling projects.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people and organizations how to use digital media (email, internet, video conference systems etc) in professional teamwork.

lender.name: Jarrod
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should just help everyone

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I feel very lucky to be born into a country where oppurtunity is abundant, and just wanted to share a little piece of that.
lender.occupational_info: I work in consruction, installing roofs on buildings.

lender.name: Milesmob
lender.loan_because: its a great lesson for the kids and a great thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large corporation running Coal trains from mines in Central Queensland to the port in Gladstone.

lender.occupational_info: I started the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster a few years ago.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: it's important
lender.occupational_info: I work in Sales and Marketing of IT products

lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office with a computer and fix other people's mistakes.

lender.name: Robyn

lender.loan_because: we want to help people to build up a good future for themselves and their children

lender.name: Leesa
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's the loving thing to do. And while I can't afford much, I will always do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the office of an ayurvedic herbal supplement company.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I hope to help make change in the world and make life better for some.
lender.occupational_info: I write books.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping entreprenuers become self sufficient. I grew up on a farm and I am especially interested in assisting livestock based business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance photographer and writer. I have a degree in Agriculture.

lender.name: Jack & Susie
lender.loan_because: we believe it is one concrete way to help people out of poverty. We have been given much.
lender.occupational_info: Jack runs a large Community Health Center in Boston. Susie is a retired Nurse. We have 18 children (15 of them adopted).

lender.name: Myrna
lender.loan_because: I respect and admire the people KIVA tells me about who are working hard to make good lives for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: Since I'm only 18 months old I pretty much wake up.. eat breakfast, play for a few hours, take a nap and then start all over again.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: it is important to give and support others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 8-10 year old students in an elementary school.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can. To spread the wealth. To give opportunities and access to capital, to those who have the drive to obtain them but also have obstacles in obtaining them.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate IT (Information Technology) roll-outs to the employees of my company.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: After spending 2005/2006 in Peace Corps Paraguay and working with Fundacion Paraguaya, I realized microloans are one of the absolute best ways out of poverty.

lender.name: carmen
lender.loan_because: We all have needed a little push some time and I am a strong believer of microlending. Los microcréditos son una gran herramienta para el financiamiento de estos proyectos.

lender.name: Carolyn

lender.name: Caitlin R
lender.loan_because: the chance of birth should not dictate someone's future - at the very least, not financially.
lender.occupational_info: I study Russian, French, Czech and international affairs in the hopes of someday helping my country's leaders and decision makers to better understand other nations and foreign publics and to always, always treat them with respect. I love to travel, read, dance and study foreign languages in my free time.
